title: Moderate a Comments Section
description: A community manager must moderate the comments section on a controversial article, removing hate speech while allowing for civil debate.

tasks.description: Scan the comments section for any posts that violate the community guidelines (e.g., personal attacks, spam, hate speech).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies comments that need to be removed.
The inappropriate comments are removed from the page.

tasks.description: If a user is a repeat offender, ban them from commenting.
